body:
Please file this bug report at https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/issues/new.

---

## What happened

I was trying to load the Emulator with my files to test the application I am building.  My computer got really hot and then this popped up.

## Version information

Android Studio `3.6` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 43.0.2` • Dart plugin `192.7761`

Flutter 1.12.13+hotfix.8 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision 0b8abb4724 (2 weeks ago) • 2020-02-11 11:44:36 -0800
Engine • revision e1e6ced81d
Tools • Dart 2.7.0

## Exception

null


title: Android Studio Telling me to submit Bug
